<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/301cb0bc17ca76a396dc75e2651dee4d/tumblr_inline_nf1sfhrMW71rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/ad1abfb84c95529e6f19df2172e70a00/tumblr_inline_nf1sx2QuLt1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p>These sweet kicks were made by a friend of dominator721’s. Question is - are these suitable for spaceflight? We’d really like to think so.</p>

They look like SPACE!!! plus Spray-On-Shoes.

I like.
Yep, the first thing to pop into my head was the spray on shoes. Awesome creation though!

ahhh but will it be in the kerbal store....

Just in NEW KERBAL SPRAY ON SPACE CABIN SHOES, spray on to save space and time, impress your friends and your co pilot.

Warning, do not use in oxygen rich atmosphere, deploy only in temp. above 60 F and below 70 , between 0.5 and 1.5 G's and at less then 11 m/s, not flame, crash or vacuum resistant.......
Wow! I could imagine this being sold as KSP merchandise in the future. Are there high-res photos?
